result.arabic_text: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا
result.translation: [from] the Lord of the heavens and earth and all that is between them, the Most Compassionate; none will dare to speak to Him[11].
result.footnotes: [11] None can ask or plead on the Day of Judgment except by Allah's permission.
